abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed credit would finance
            topographic surveys, drillings, geophysical and geotechnical
            investigations; hydrological measurements; preparation of
            final designs, tender documents and technical schedules,
            including cost estimates, for the development of 3,500 ha;
            study of the impact of irrigated development on health
            conditions; study of the manpower and educational
            requirements for the implementation of the irrigation
            projects presently under preparation in the country; and
            technical assistance to the Ministry of Planning.
